dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.
dependencies.name: ninja

dependencies.description:
Hjson is an user interface for JSON. The Python implementation of Hjson
is based on simplejson.
dependencies.name: py-hjson

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description: Get CPU info with pure Python 2 & 3
dependencies.name: py-py-cpuinfo

dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.
dependencies.name: py-pydantic

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
dependencies.name: py-torch

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
DeepSpeed library. DeepSpeed enables world's most powerful language
models like MT-530B and BLOOM. It is an easy-to-use deep learning
optimization software suite that powers unprecedented scale and speed
for both training and inference.
name: py-deepspeed

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
